attributes.action: ADMIT ITS ABOUT STELF TAX NOT PROTECTING THE ENVIRONMENT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the new higher tax on air travel is not about revenue why has the government  today reaffirmed its commitment to airport expansion, despite warnings that the move undermined the UK's efforts to tackle climate change. SO THE NEW HIGHER TAX ON AIR TRAVEL, HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH THE BILLIONS OF POUNDS GORDON BROWN WILL GET FROM IT. STOP TREATING THE PUBLIC AS IDIOTS, AND ADMIT THE ENVIRONMENT HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH IT, BUT THE REVENUE IT WILL GENERATE  
HAS.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
